summary: This is an email from Allison Stoddart of WilmerHale law firm transmitting a letter and materials on behalf of client JPMorgan Chase to the SDNY (Southern District of New York). It references a password-protected disc containing production materials, likely related to legal proceedings involving JPMorgan Chase and the Epstein case.

persons.name: Allison Stoddart
persons.context: Sends email transmitting a letter and materials on behalf of client JPMorgan Chase to the SDNY.

persons.name: Anjan Salmi
persons.context: Listed as a recipient in the email's Cc field.

connections.description: Stoddart sends an email to Salmi (and others) transmitting legal materials.

events.title: SDNY Letter Submission
events.description: A letter on behalf of JPMorgan Chase is sent to the SDNY, accompanied by a password-protected disc containing production materials.

keyFacts: JPMorgan Chase, through its law firm WilmerHale, is producing materials to the SDNY related to the Epstein case.
The production includes a password-protected disc, indicating sensitive or confidential information.
The communication demonstrates ongoing legal proceedings or investigations involving JPMorgan Chase in March 2020.
